name: Bats Help Prom
description:
Made for my University's "Something Jam". Prompt was the ///what.three.words of your favourite location and mine was ///Bats.Help.Prom, where I used to stay when I visited my dad =]

You are Ray, a bat. Ray has no idea why he's a bat, if he ever was something else to begin with, but he can only move forward. Today is prom, and a teenager needs advice. A short experience.
